content.string:
[h2]Highlights[/h2] [list] [*]Lade till en bakgrundsbild på huvudmenyn med SynTek Residential-tema. [*]Kameraflödena som visas bakom briefingen är mindre statiska och mindre störande. [*]Många vapen är nu mer träffsäkra när man hukar sig. [/list]
[h2]Weapons[/h2] [i]Weapon recoil has been changed on several guns. A coding error was previously causing "flattened" recoil to work differently when aiming north or south versus east or west.[/i] [list] [*][b]22A3-1 Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° (wide) × 03° (tall) → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]22A4-2 Combat Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]22A5 Heavy Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 06° × 03° → 06° × 01°. [*][b]22A7-Z Prototype Assault Rifle:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]50CMG4-1:[/b] Normal spread: 20° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 20° × 10°. Crouch spread: 20° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 10° × 05°. [*][b]IAF Medical SMG:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]IAF Minigun:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]K80 Personal Defense Weapon:[/b] Normal spread: 03° × 03° → unchanged. Crouch spread: 03° × 03° → 01° × 01°. [*][b]M42 Vindicator:[/b] Normal spread: 22° × 22° → 22° × 12°. Crouch spread: 22° × 22° → 16° × 06°. [*][b]Model 35 Pump-action Shotgun:[/b] Normal spread: 22° × 22° → 22° × 12°. Crouch spread: 22° × 22° → 16° × 06°. [*][b]PS50 Bulldog:[/b] Normal spread: 15° × ~2.5° (broken!) → 15° × 03°. Crouch spread: 06° × ~1.5° (broken!) → 06° × 01°. [*][b]S23A SynTek Autogun:[/b] Normal spread: 07° × 07° → 07° × 03°. Crouch spread: 07° × 07° → 04° × 01°. [/list]
[h2]Uppdragsförbättringar[/h2] [list] [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Cargo Elevator:[/b] Made the ceiling of the elevator slightly transparent to help with camera rotation. [*][b]Jacob's Rest: Cargo Elevator:[/b] Fixed some flickering on the exit door of the elevator. [*][b]Jacobs Vila: Deima Yt-bro:[/b] Fixade några drönarspawn-platser på bron som resulterade i att utomjordingar fastnade. [*][b]Jacobs Vila: Deima Yt-bro:[/b] Förbättrad anstormingsspawns runt slutet av bron. [*][b]Research 7: Illyn Forest:[/b] Removed parasites from out-of-bounds eggs to improve performance. Improved alien navigation around first biomass. Fixed marines may get stuck there as well. [*][b]Research 7: Jericho Mines:[/b] Removed parasites from out-of-bounds eggs to improve performance. [*][b]Tårar för Tarnor: Övergivna Underhållstunnlar:[/b] Fixade problemet med att utomjordingar fastnade runt lasern. [*][b]Tårar för Tarnor: Oasis Koloni Rymdhamn:[/b] Fixade en xenomit-spawnplats i kontrollrummet som inte fungerade. Fixed harvester moving to unreachable area near map end. [*][b]Tilarus-5: Arktisk Infiltration:[/b] Åtgärdade vilseledande kollisioner runt den första luftslussen. [*][b]Tilarus-5: Communication Center:[/b] Fixed some rare crashes and improved visals. [*][b]Lana's Escape: Lana's Maintenance:[/b] Fixed there sometimes not being enough hackable panels to fix the bridge. [*][b]Lana's Escape: Lana's Bridge:[/b] Minor performance improvements. Improved visuals of out-of-bounds cannon. [*][b]Paranoia: Hostile Places:[/b] Minor visual improvements. [*][b]Paranoia: Hög Spänning:[/b] Åtgärdade vissa fall av markflimmer. [*][b]Paranoia: Crucial Point:[/b] Reduced terrain complexity that did not affect gameplay or visuals for slightly faster load time. [*][b]Nam Humanum: Platform XVII:[/b] Fixade anstormingsutomjordingar som spawnade i luften längs plattformsspåret. [*][b]Nam Humanum: Markarbetes Labbet:[/b] Fixade problemet med att marinsoldater fastnade i början efter de första åtta (i speciella spellägen med fler än åtta marinsoldater). [*][b]Nam Humanum: Markarbetes Labbet:[/b] Åtgärdade ett prestandaproblem när man närmade sig det centrala området i flerspelarläge. [*][b]Reducering: Förfallna Staden:[/b] Fixade en brand nära några ägg i slutet av uppdraget som var väldigt långsam att antända. [*][b]DM Desert:[/b] Fixed obstacles being tinted dark blue. [*][p][b]Reduced networking traffic by optimizing prop_ragdoll on the following maps:[/b][/p][list][*][p]Jacob's Rest: Landing bay[/p][/*][*][p]Jacob's Rest: Syntek Residental[/p][/*][*][p]Nam Humanum: Platform XVII[/p][/*][*][p]Paranoia: Close Contact[/p][/*][*][p]Paranoia: Crucial Point[/p][/*][*][p]Research 7: Jericho Mines[/p][/*][*][p]Tears for Tarnor: Desert Outpost[/p][/*][*][p]Tilarus-5: Arctic Infiltration[/p][/*][*][p]Tilarus-5: Syntek Hospital[/p][/*][/list][/*] [/list]
